name: Howard Joel Wolowitz
review: I purchased this instrument for my 5-year old daughter during the pandemic when we signed her up for online violin lessons (spring'2021). It sounds good and worked out.

name: Sheldon Cooper
review: I've been playing cello for about 25 years and have played mostly school cellos and rentals and my own Hammond Ashley. Helicore strings are bright.

name: Amy Farrah Fowler
review: I received this after a lot of research and was very excited to play. It is a bit heavy and takes a little time to figure out the installation

name: Penny Hofstadter
review: The assembly was easy, the instructions were clear. Packaging was very good. Overall happy with the product. Perfect for a kid who is going to start learning.

name: Bernadette Rostenkowski
review: I should have done a little more research before buying this product, so my negative experience with it is probably partly my fault

name: Rajesh Ramayan Koothrappali,
review: A very good example of a 3/4 size classical guitar. I was quite pleased with the extras that come with it such as a bag, extra strings and especially an electronic tuner.
